Their best selling dishes are Crispy airBaked‚Ñ¢ Chicken Katsu, Couscous Beetroot Tabbouleh, Maqlouba and Mini airBaked‚Ñ¢ Chicken Nuggets, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Healthy, Sandwiches, Burgers.
They have been reviewed 639 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Their best selling dishes are Simply Chicken Burger, Simply Chicken Burger Meal, Lounge Burger Meal and Burger And Egg Sandwich, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Chicken, Burgers.
Corn and Potato is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Snacks that delivers across Mahboula.

Burger King is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Burgers, Fast Food, Fried Chicken that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Chicken Fries, Chicken Tenders, Chicken Royale Meal and Mozarella Sticks 4 PCS, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Burgers, Fast Food, Fried Chicken.

General_review: Rochas sweets is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Pastries, Cakes that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Dolce Sweet, Snak, Large Vine Leaves and Musakan And Waraek Anab, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Pastries, Cakes.
They have been reviewed 14290 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Sukkar is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Coffee, Cafe that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Adailiya, Airport and Al-Ahmadi.

Their best selling dishes are Chocolates 36 Layers, Mango Strawberry Gelato, Tiger Sweet and Mix Sukkar Box 78 Pcs 920gram, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Coffee, Cafe.
They have been reviewed 14098 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: CINNABON is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Breakfast, Cafe that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Halifa.
Their best selling dishes are Pecan Bites, Cinnabon Classic, Classic Bites and Mini Caramel Pecan Bon, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Breakfast, Cafe.
They have been reviewed 65525 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

Their best selling dishes are Giveaway Box, Kinder Munchkins, Kinder Crush and Original Munchkins, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Donuts, Desserts, Bakery.
They have been reviewed 33463 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Karam Sweet is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Arabic sweets, Cakes that delivers across Ali Sabah Al-Salem - Umm Al Hayman, Ardhiya, Ashbeliah, Egaila and Hawally.

Their best selling dishes are NEW CHOCOLATE PISTACHIO BAR, ALBAA 8 PEC, W/A POMEGRANATE & LEMON 32 PCS and W/A POMGRANA 32 PCS, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Arabic sweets, Cakes.
They have been reviewed 17864 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Toby's Estate is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Coffee, Desserts, Juices that delivers across Abu Halifa, Al-Qurain, Jabriya, Jahra - Taima and Khairan.

Their best selling dishes are Iced Toby's Latte, 12 Oz Toby's Latte, Iced Americano and Iced Toby's Latte - 20Oz, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Coffee, Desserts, Juices.
They have been reviewed 21478 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Dozen is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Chocolate that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa, Abu Hasaniya and Adailiya.
Their best selling dishes are Special Bite, Bites And Kinder Zwara, Bites Zwara and Kinder Cookies Box, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Chocolate .
They have been reviewed 12754 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Their best selling dishes are Crispy Choco, Coconut Crispy, Salted Crispy and Mango Trifle, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Chocolate , Cakes.
They have been reviewed 22397 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

info.Address: in West Abu Fetera Small Indust, Kuwait

General_review: Simsim is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Pastries, Bakery, Breakfast that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa, Abu Hasaniya and Al Masayel.

Their best selling dishes are Simsim Minis Signature, Simsim Select 12 Pide, Lahm Bi Ajin Safeha and Beetroot Hummus, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Pastries, Bakery, Breakfast.
They have been reviewed 31480 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

info.Address: in West Abu Fetera Small Indust, Kuwait

General_review: Elite Sweet is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Chocolate , Pastries & Sweets that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Offer Sweet Mix And Fatayer, Offer Baqlawa And Fatayer, Chocolate Box Small and Mini Cake With Flower 6, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Chocolate , Pastries & Sweets.
They have been reviewed 11635 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Shawarma Hatem is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Shawarma, Arabic that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abu Ftaira, Abu Hasaniya, Adailiya and Adan.
Their best selling dishes are Fries, shawarma chicken, Chicken Shawarma Saj and Kebab sandwich, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Shawarma, Arabic.
They have been reviewed 16852 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Yelo! Pizza is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Pizza, American, Fast Food that delivers across Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Hasaniya, Adailiya, Ardhiya and Ashbeliah.

Their best selling dishes are Baked Wedges, Margherita Pizza (Thin - Pan - NY), Pepperoni Pizza (Thin - Pan - NY) and Pepperoni NY Medium, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Pizza, American, Fast Food.
They have been reviewed 25028 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Bazooka is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Fast Food, Fried chicken, Burgers that delivers across Abu Halifa, Dhajeej, Farwaniya, Jahra - Jahra Area and Jahra - Jahra Area.

Their best selling dishes are 2+2= 2 Wrap Chicken, Super Offer 1, 2+2= 2 Chicken Classic shoot and Musahab Mood 10 Pcs Meal, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Fast Food, Fried chicken, Burgers.
They have been reviewed 30061 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Wahad Sandwich is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Shawarma, Kebab, Sandwiches that delivers across Ardhiya, Jahra - Jahra Area, Mangaf, Reggai and Sabah Al-Salem.

Their best selling dishes are Naimi Shawarma Sandwich, Kebab Sandwich, Shish Tawook Sandwich and One Sandwich Combo, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Shawarma, Kebab, Sandwiches.
They have been reviewed 5012 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Swaikhat Street is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Grills, Saj, Kebab that delivers across Farwaniya, Fnaitess and Salmiya.
Their best selling dishes are Hummus, Tikka Meat With Loumi, Arayes Meat and Grilled Kebab, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Grills, Saj, Kebab.
They have been reviewed 4882 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Clock restaurant is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Burgers, American, Italian that delivers across Abu Halifa, Ardhiya and Jahra - Jahra Area.
Their best selling dishes are Loaded Fries, Cheese Pink Pasta, Alfredo Pasta and Bronze Chicken Bites, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Burgers, American, Italian.
They have been reviewed 13857 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

They have been reviewed 41801 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Shake Shack is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Burgers, Chicken, Sandwiches that delivers across Al Barsha 1, Al Barsha 3, Al Falah City, Al Gharrafa and Al Khubeirah.
Their best selling dishes are Shack Burger Box, ShackBurger, Cheese Fries and Fries, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Burgers, Chicken, Sandwiches.
They have been reviewed 11014 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

Their best selling dishes are Deboned Shawarma, Deboned Half Chicken, Deboned Whole Chicken and Chicken Rice Dish, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Grills, Shawarma, Healthy.
They have been reviewed 46735 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

info.Address: in West Abu Fetera Small Indust, Kuwait

General_review: TOBO is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Burgers, American, Fast Food that delivers across Ardhiya, Jahra - Jahra Area, Sabah Al-Salem, Sharq and West Abu Fetera Small Indust.

Their best selling dishes are 1 Truffle Burger & Fries, 2 Burger & fries, Small O's 3pcs and 1 Honey Mabooch & Fries, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Burgers, American, Fast Food.
They have been reviewed 10409 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Steak & Fahita Stations is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Sandwiches, Burgers, Shawarma that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Fajita Station Meal, Philadelphia, Chicken Fillet Meal and Chicken Twister, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Sandwiches, Burgers, Shawarma.
They have been reviewed 5759 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Farooj Ahmad Al Abdalla is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Sandwiches, Grills, Chicken that delivers across Abu Ftaira and Salmiya.

Their best selling dishes are Medium Lebanese Chicken Sandwich, Large Chicken Lebanese Sandwich, Large Chicken Lebanese Meal and 2 Medium Lebanese Musahab Meal, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Sandwiches, Grills, Chicken.
They have been reviewed 1023 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Shawarma Arabi is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Shawarma, Sandwiches, Fast Food that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Arabi Meat Shawarma, Arabic Chicken Shawarma, Arabi Fries and Kebab Sandwich, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Shawarma, Sandwiches, Fast Food.
They have been reviewed 14520 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

Customer_reviews.review_comment: the tanoor bread option was by far the best, followed closely by the qass option.

General_review: Kabab Factory is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Kebab, Sandwiches, Shawarma that delivers across Ardhiya, Bneid Al Qar, Egaila, Jahra - Jahra Area and Jeleeb Al-Shuyoukh.

Their best selling dishes are Shish Tawook Medkhn Sandwich, Super Crispy Potato , Kabab Naemi Sandwich and Chicken Musahab Spicy , although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Kebab, Sandwiches, Shawarma.
They have been reviewed 11090 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.
